summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 4.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 186 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1770 m), feels like temperature (up 2.5°C), outside temperature (up 2.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 186.3m lower than yesterday, 721.0m lower than the past week, 1770.4m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 713m and a peak of 1594m, averaging 880.7m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and little or no wind. Moderate rainfall, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and the light is absent. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
